extendedIngredients.name: ginger
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1 large hand ginger, peeled and cut into 1/2-inch coins/chunks

extendedIngredients.name: juice of lime
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1 lime, juiced, plus lime wedges for garnish

extendedIngredients.name: tequila
extendedIngredients.originalString: 2 ounces good quality tequila or reposado (recommended: Cabo Wabo)

recipes.title: Ginger Margarita
recipes.instructions: Watch how to make this recipe.                    Bring sugar and water up to a light simmer and cook until all of the sugar is dissolved. Add ginger and steep for 30 minutes. Pour ginger-simple syrup into blender and puree. Strain out pulp and store in a tightly sealed jar or bottle. Will keep for several weeks in the refrigerator.                          Pour some bar sugar onto small plate and grate a pinch of nutmeg on top, mix well.                          Add tequila, lime juice, 5 ounces ginger-simple syrup and ice to cocktail shaker and give it a good shake. Run lime wedge around rim of glass and dip in sugar/nutmeg mixture, add ice and pour in contents of shaker, grate a little nutmeg on top and serve with a wedge of lime.

steps.step: Watch how to make this recipe.
Bring sugar and water up to a light simmer and cook until all of the sugar is dissolved.
Add ginger and steep for 30 minutes.
Pour ginger-simple syrup into blender and puree. Strain out pulp and store in a tightly sealed jar or bottle. Will keep for several weeks in the refrigerator.
Pour some bar sugar onto small plate and grate a pinch of nutmeg on top, mix well.

Add tequila, lime juice, 5 ounces ginger-simple syrup and ice to cocktail shaker and give it a good shake. Run lime wedge around rim of glass and dip in sugar/nutmeg mixture, add ice and pour in contents of shaker, grate a little nutmeg on top and serve with a wedge of lime.
